amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute contained language concerning: the acquisition of the Wilcox Ranch in Utah; a land conveyance in Yavapai County, Arizona; and a land exchange at the El Portal Administrative Site in California.
amendment.purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Hansen.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hansen amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
